issue.message: Field requires API level 23 (current min is 21): `android.view.View#SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LIGHT_STATUS_BAR`
Attribute `usesCleartextTraffic` is only used in API level 23 and higher (current min is 21)
Attribute `directBootAware` is only used in API level 24 and higher (current min is 21)
Attribute `trackTint` is only used in API level 23 and higher (current min is 21)
Attribute `trackTintMode` is only used in API level 23 and higher (current min is 21)
The WIFI_SERVICE must be looked up on the Application context or memory will leak on devices < Android N. Try changing `applicationContext` to `applicationContext.getApplicationContext()`
Found dynamic locale changes, but did not find corresponding Play Core library calls for downloading languages and splitting by language is not disabled in the `bundle` configuration
Limit vector icons sizes to 200×200 to keep icon drawing fast; see https://developer.android.com/studio/write/vector-asset-studio#when for more

Use of this function is discouraged because resource reflection makes it harder to perform build optimizations and compile-time verification of code. It is much more efficient to retrieve resources by identifier (e.g. `R.foo.bar`) than by name (e.g. `getIdentifier("bar", "foo", null)`).
"behavour" is a common misspelling; did you mean "behavior" or "behaviour"?
